Item ID1741

Leather is obtained from tanning a cowhide. Leather can be used with a needle and thread to be crafted into leather gloves, leather boots, leather cowl, leather vambraces, leather body, a coif or leather chaps, granting Crafting experience.

A single piece of leather can be found on top of a table in the Shayzien Encampment. You must use telekinetic grab to pick it up.

One piece of leather is required for Mourning's End Part I, Cold War and Elemental Workshop I.

[[File:Leather_detail.png|120px|left]]
'''Leather''' is obtained from [[Tanner|tanning]] a [[cowhide]]. Leather can be used with a [[needle]] and [[thread]] to be crafted into [[leather gloves]], [[leather boots]], [[leather cowl]], [[leather vambraces]], [[leather body]], a [[coif]] or [[leather chaps]], granting [[Crafting]] experience.

A single piece of leather can be found on top of a table in the [[Shayzien Encampment]]. You must use telekinetic grab to pick it up.

One piece of leather is required for [[Mourning's End Part I]], [[Cold War]] and [[Elemental Workshop I]].
